1110181372503736322.text:
HTC is giving away two EXODUS 1 phones as prizes in the Creator Contest!
Read about their philosophy of trust and security, and learn how to qualify, on our blog: https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/win-exodus-in-creator-contest …pic.twitter.com/RbqGCblzpg

1118638646700019712.text:
The Creator Contest winners are in, marking the end of the first scene building competition! Learn more, and check out the winners at: https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/announcing-creator-contest-winners …

You can also view all of the winning scenes at http://contest.decentraland.org !pic.twitter.com/BY1r2xy5qK

1122943462297485312.text:
We're pleased to share the latest beta release of the Decentraland SDK 6.0! Update your CLI to start using larger parcels, a better audio engine, more robust animations, and much more.
 For all of the details, read the full announcement on our blog: https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/introducing-sdk-6-beta …pic.twitter.com/TkMAvLAQmp

1112383762065752066.text: Time to put those finishing touches on your scenes. Only 12 hours left to submit your entries for the Decentraland Creator Contest: https://contest.decentraland.org/  - The deadline for submissions is 00:00 1st April EST. Happy Building!pic.twitter.com/RJ4kS37bW5

1107644611177127937.text:
Today's the day! 
We're proud to announce the launch of Decentraland's Builder, and the official kick-off to the Creator Contest! 
Start building at http://builder.decentraland.org  
or read more on our blog at: https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/meet-decentralands-builder …pic.twitter.com/D9JNJhZfAB

1118638983322292224.text: Thanks to our partners for helping to co-sponsor the event, @htcexodus, @BittrexExchange, and @coingecko for helping us make the Creator Contest a reality!

1120758403880513536.text: For the latest details and updates from Avatars, sign up athttps://decentraland.org/avatars

1120736673879482368.text: We're excited to introduce Avatars for Decentraland! Express your virtual self and explore the metaverse in style with a truly one-of-a-kind avatar. Find out more at https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/explore-decentraland-in-style …pic.twitter.com/0UKfA5kUtH

1112708537245814784.text: For a recap of the Creator Contest, and a look at our next steps, visit:https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/the-creator-contest-has-ended …

1108729779212161026.text: We're delighted to share that the @BittrexExchange has joined our celebration of the Builder's arrival by sponsoring their own competition for unusually spectacular scenes! Learn more about Bittrex and the prizes they're offering over on our blog: https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/join-creator-contest-with-bittrex …pic.twitter.com/40Y45eZ9Ao

1121162917297184768.text: Today, we've added a feature to the Builder allowing you to download and upload scenes! For more details and a quick tutorial, check out our blog: https://decentraland.org/blog/announcements/download-upload-builder-scenes …pic.twitter.com/2y3ai1UAkq

1111384657788952576.text:
We've just updated the Marketplace! Now all bids on LAND are listed publicly, and owners can archive their offers.

Read up on all the details in our blog: https://decentraland.org/blog/technology/say-hello-to-bids-v2 …pic.twitter.com/ey9szSsgMG

1112570648801374208.text:
We've reached the end of the Creator Contest! Over 9,000 scenes were submitted, filling a rough total of 31,000 LAND parcels with amazing user-built content!

In a couple short weeks, we'll announce the winning builders and distribute everyone's prizes!pic.twitter.com/KJD6qg2TUX

1110644032739381251.text: With less than a week left before the Creator Contest ends, the submissions are pouring in and people are sharing their creations with the community! We've highlighted a few of our favorites on our blog. Check them out: https://decentraland.org/blog/platform/creator-contest-highlights …pic.twitter.com/N44NHHV9Fb

1109910770077388801.text: Got design skills? Here's your chance to impress #Bittrex CEO Bill Shihara. He'll determine the winner of the Creator Contest with @decentraland. Enter contest: http://builder.decentraland.org .pic.twitter.com/IISvPybYx7

1113774714974089216.text:
Less than 24 hours until the #chainbreakers crowdsale enters the next stage. Don't miss out on this last opportunity to purchase perfect armors, more splendid rares and more honor

> Changes Gen2 
https://medium.com/qwellcode-vr/caution-major-item-changes-as-nft-crowdsale-increments-to-gen-2-429b683b383e …

> Limited #NFTs (Baby Pets) 
https://medium.com/qwellcode-vr/baby-pet-event-ends-on-april-30th-671b7e5f27d9 …pic.twitter.com/lneyZwwT6T

1108746834149810177.text: We're excited to be part of the Creator Contest with @decentraland. Here's your chance to build and win prizes: http://builder.decentraland.org .pic.twitter.com/Ytg9Uxufb6

1113029928382009345.text:
We decided to extend this crowdsale phase for 3 days until April 5th. Old and new community members contacted us and asked for more time to get organized before investing. 

We updated the initial article with further explanations. Countdown is updated. https://medium.com/qwellcode-vr/caution-major-item-changes-as-nft-crowdsale-increments-to-gen-2-429b683b383e …pic.twitter.com/4itXRi0NV6

1109995707816001536.text:
We have a Gecko on @decentraland new Builder. We're giving out additional $200 worth of MANA for the 3 most creatively designed Gecko incorporated in Decentraland's Contest. https://contest.decentraland.org/ 
Submit them to us via Twitter! End Date 31 Mar 2019 23:59 ESTpic.twitter.com/oNsK2EceMp

1110393446257299462.text: You want to be a creator of worlds? Then join the @Decentraland #CreatorContest. The top 2 winners who create a scene that best matches “building a foundation of trust and security” will #win an #EXODUS1 each. #contest #HTCEXODUS #ZIONVault https://buff.ly/2uqNsr4 pic.twitter.com/hWjZXwblR8
